Council Agendas
===============

[Home](https://www.horizoncity.org/)
Council Agendas

City Council Agendas
====================

The Town of Horizon City Council meets the 2nd Tuesday of the month at 6:00 p.m. at Town Hall, 14999 Darrington Road, Horizon City, TX  79928.

The Council Agenda is posted at the entrance to Town Hall, 72 hours in advance of Council meetings.

Council Meetings begins with an open forum, where anyone can sign up to address the Council.

Town of Horizon City Hall

14999 Darrington Road
Horizon City, Texas 79928
phone: (915) 852-1046
fax: (915) 852-1005


[![](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/boardbook_icon.png)](https://login.boardbook.org/)

Monday – Thursday 7:00am to 6:00pm
Friday - Closed
(Closed for lunch 11:45am to 1:00pm)
